name: overshoes
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
coverings worn over your ordinary shoes, worn especially in order to protect your shoes or to keep the surface you are walking on clean : Raised overshoes were worn by women to keep the hems of their dresses out of the mud. The doctors and nurses had full face masks, goggles to cover their eyes and plastic overshoes. The sealskin overshoes worn by Captain Scott on his last expedition to the South Pole are being conserved at the National Maritime Museum. See also
galoshes
popovaphoto/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe company makes protective plastic overshoes to keep dirt out of computer rooms.Go down to the river, but be sure you put on your overshoes!The bicycles and overshoes were left in the hallway.
